error.notexist: I'm sorry, but it appears that action does not exist.
error.unknown: I encountered an unknown error while trying to process that action.
error.disabled: The module that action is tied to ({}) is disabled.

rules.one: 1. Swearing is fine but no slurs.
rules.two: 2. Keep the edginess to a minimum (no self-deprecating, this includes denying being cute).
rules.three: 3. Transphobia, homophobia, exclusionism, etc. are strictly prohibited.
rules.four: 4. Keep the peace and if you have a problem, please contact TwilySparky#6666 (Coney Pony Empress), any of the Admins (Coney Pony Princesses), or any of the Moderators (Coney Pony Guards).
rules.five: 5. No NSFW or obscene content. If you're not sure, then don't post it. Keep it PG-13. We are strictly a SFW server with no hidden NSFW channels. We are fairly relaxed on our rules but we might need to take a harder stance on those who want to subvert the rules.
rules.six: 6. NFT/Crypto discussion is BANNED from this server due to the toxic nature it sparks. Please go elsewhere for discussion based on Crypto/NFTs.
rules.otherinfo:
DISCORD INVITE LINK: https://discord.gg/coneyponey
GUILDED INVITE LINK (BACKUP): https://www.guilded.gg/i/kbZGqn5k?cid=2df89a86-1ad2-43ff-8a2a-1e300ab96750&intent=chat

success.title: Forum Account Created!
success.description:
Your forum account has been created! Your infomation to log in is below.
Please change the provided email address and password once you log in!

alreadyexists.title: Forum Account Creation Failed
alreadyexists.description: You already have a forum account. Did you forget your email?

error.title: Forum Account Creation Failed
error.description:
Something went wrong.. somewhere
We've logged the error and will investigate.

dmuser.failure: Something went wrong while trying to send that message. Maybe the user has DMs disabled or the bot blocked?
